text: SMT 2014 Calculus Tiebreaker February 15, 2014 Time limit: 15 minutes. Instructions: This tiebreaker contains 3 short answer questions. All answers must be expressed in simplest form unless speciﬁed otherwise. You will submit answers to the problem as you solve them, and may solve problems in any order. You will not be informed whether your answer is correct until the end of the tiebreaker. You may submit multiple times for any of the problems, but only the last submission for a given problem will be graded. The participant who correctly answers the most problems wins the tiebreaker, with ties broken by the time of the last correct submission. No calculators. 1. Compute ∫ 2014 2012 [(x − 2013)2 + (x − 2015)2] dx. 2. Let f (x) = (x2 + 8x + 20)ex. Find f (100)(x). 3. Calculate the inﬁnite series ∞∑ k=1 1 2k2 − k .
